mapper.select: -- 帖子基本信息 SELECT id,user_id,title,replies_count,type_id FROM boki_post WHERE id = #{postId}; -- 楼层总数 SELECT COUNT(1) AS totalCount FROM boki_reply br JOIN boki_user bu ON br.user_id = bu.id WHERE br.post_id = #{postId}; -- 楼层列表 SELECT br.id, br.user_id,br.post_id,br.floor_no,br.create_time,br.content,br.replies_count, bu.user_name,bu.photo,bu.exp,bu.credit_degree,bu.role_id,bu.show FROM boki_reply br JOIN boki_user bu ON br.user_id = bu.id WHERE br.post_id = #{postId} ORDER BY br.floor_no LIMIT #{start},#{end};

SELECT bsr.id, bsr.storey_id, bsr.user_id, bu1.user_name, -- bsr.to_user_id, -- bu2.user_name AS to_user_name, bsr.content, bsr.create_time FROM boki_storey_reply bsr JOIN boki_user bu1 ON bsr.user_id = bu1.id -- JOIN boki_user bu2 ON bsr.user_id = bu2.id WHERE bsr.storey_id = #{replyId} LIMIT #{start},#{end}
SELECT br.id,br.role,bp.permission FROM boki_role br JOIN boki_permission bp ON br.id = bp.role_id ORDER BY br.id
